name: Ghost Town Girls
description:
being the spooky adventures of Gunilla Gesundheit and Albertine Crank.

Contains secret areas and a bonus ending.

Made quickly - not enough time to test properly. Let me know if you find any bugs.

Made for Weirder Stuff 2 - a gamejam on itch.io run by Clickteam 20th to 23rd October 2017.

The theme was "80's Flavored Paranormal".

Controls

WASD and space key.
When inside a building you can leave at any time by moving beyond the edge of the screen.
